scripts.update-maplibre: cd lib/maplibre-gl-js && git reset --hard && git fetch --tags && git checkout $(git tag -l 'v*' --sort=-v:refname | head -1) && cd ../.. && npm run sync-maplibre
scripts.sync-maplibre: cd lib/maplibre-gl-js && npm install && npx tsx build/generate-style-code.ts && cd ../.. && npx tsx scripts/sync-maplibre.ts
scripts.build-node: rm -rf dist && tsc -p tsconfig.node.json && chmod +x dist/index.js
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build
scripts.upgrade: npm-check-updates -u -t minor; rm -f package-lock.json; rm -rf node_modules; npm i
